articles.title: About Your Mavens
articles.description: Roles, office hours, backgrounds, and more.
articles.contents:
Contents
Site Administrators
Derek Holliday - R Maven
Ciara Sterbenz - Math Maven

Site Contributers
Alex Rossell Hayes - R Maven
Doeun Kim - R Maven


Site Administrators
In charge of routine site upkeep/content moderation.
Derek Holliday - R Maven
Derek is a 5th year graduate student in American Politics. His methodological interests include machine learning, text-as-data, and survey experiments.
Office hours:
Tues/Thurs 1-3:30PM (in-person Bunche 4337)
Wed 10AM-12PM (Virtual, email for zoom link)
Contact: deholliday at ucla dot edu
Personal website: derekholliday.com
Ciara Sterbenz - Math Maven
Office hours:
Mon 10:30AM-2PM
Tues 9AM-12:30PM
Contact: cster at ucla dot edu
Site Contributers
Other methods mavens contributing content to this site
Alex Rossell Hayes - R Maven
Office hours:
Mon 12-1PM
Sat/Sun 10:20AM-1:30PM
Contact: alexhayes at ucla dot edu
Doeun Kim - R Maven
Office hours:
Tues 3-5:30PM (offline/online)
Fri 12-1PM / 2-5:30PM (online)
Contact: doeun2+Rmaven at ucla dot edu

articles.title: UCLA PoliSci Methods Mavens Resources
articles.description: A clearinghouse for R/Stats resources for political science graduate students.
